info.name: africanwhisper
info.summary: A short description of your project

info.author: Kevin Kibe
info.name: africanwhisper
info.summary: A package for fast fine-tuning and API endpoint deployment of Whisper model specifically developed to accelerate Automatic Speech Recognition(ASR) for African Languages.
